price: “Не бојте се!”, рече Он, “Ја сам с вама, Ја све чујем и видим.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
